parse.title: Flags of the regions of Ukraine

text.*:
The flags of the subdivisions of Ukraine exhibit a wide variety of regional influences and local histories, as well as widely different styles and design principles. Most local flags were designed and adopted after 1991.

Contents

  • 1 Flags of Ukrainian oblasts
  • 2 Flag of autonomous republic
  • 3 Flags of cities with special status
  • 4 Historical
    • 4.1 Flags of Ruthenian lands in the battle of Tannenberg, 1410.
    • 4.2 Cossacks' flags captured by Radzivil in 1651
    • 4.3 Flags of Black Sea Cossack Host
  • 5 See also
